existing_stories.title: Story 5.5: Timeline Tracking and Automatic Reversal
existing_stories.description: User Story: As a System, I want to track provisional credit timelines and reverse when appropriate, so that temporary credits are managed according to case outcomes. Acceptance Criteria: Timeline stores issuance date, amount, investigation deadline Case outcome (won/lost/partial/pending) continuously monitored Automatic reversal trigger for lost cases executes successfully Permanent credit conversion applied for won cases Partial outcomes produce proportional reversal Customer notification 5–7 days before scheduled reversal Reversal failures escalated immediately Audit trail captures all reversal attempts & results Success/failure reversal rates tracked SLA compliance for reversal execution monitored  Prerequisites: Story 5.4 (banking integration), Epic 4 Feature 4.3 (case outcomes). Technical Notes: Implement scheduler scanning active provisional credits daily. Use state machine for credit status (temporary, pending-conversion, permanent, reversed). Notifications via unified messaging service. Reversal idempotency key prevents double reversal. Metrics exported for finance reconciliation.

existing_stories.title: Story 4.8: Representment Workflow Orchestration
existing_stories.description: User Story: As a System, I want to orchestrate multi-stage representment processes, so that complex back-and-forth with merchants is managed systematically. Acceptance Criteria: Merchant evidence request and receipt tracked Bank response compilation and submission managed Pre-arbitration handling supported if initiated Arbitration process handled when escalated State machine tracks workflow stages Automatic transitions fire based on events Evidence from each stage preserved with versioning Timelines enforced at each stage Agents notified of required actions Outcomes recorded and reportable  Prerequisites: Story 4.5 (status tracking), Story 4.6 (deadlines), Story 4.7 (reminders) Technical Notes: Implement state machine (e.g., workflow engine) with explicit states (Initial, Representment, Pre-Arb, Arb, Closed). Store transitions with timestamps and actor. Support manual override. Include retry/backoff for evidence requests. Provide analytics on cycle durations.

existing_stories.title: Story 4.4: Automated Chargeback Submission
existing_stories.description: User Story: As a System, I want to automatically submit chargebacks to card networks, so that cases are processed without manual intervention. Acceptance Criteria: Chargeback submitted via network API Network confirmation/reference number received Submission status updated in database Submission timestamp recorded Evidence package archived with reference Notification sent to stakeholders on success Submission failures trigger alerts Retry logic handles transient errors (exponential backoff) Manual fallback available for API failures Audit trail captures all submission attempts  Prerequisites: Story 4.3 (network APIs), Story 4.2 (formatted packages) Technical Notes: Implement async job queue for submissions. Store submission receipts and correlation IDs. Include circuit breaker for persistent failures. Provide admin UI to requeue failed submissions.
